task_name: Lambda: Develop Secure Formula Execution Handler
resource_notes: Security-critical task requiring deep expertise in Node.js sandboxing. Vulnerability here compromises the entire feature.
alternative_approach: Use a third-party sandboxing service, which would increase cost and introduce external dependency.
risk_factors: RISK-001: High risk of sandbox escape. Requires mandatory security review.
mitigation_strategy: Multi-layered defense: strict IAM roles, syntax validation, and mandatory security code review.

task_name: Frontend: Implement Offline Queuing for History
resource_notes: Complex state management between online/offline states. High potential for data loss bugs.
alternative_approach: Remove offline support requirement, which would violate a core NFR (REQ-1-013).
risk_factors: RISK-002: High risk of data loss bugs due to complexity of offline logic and conflict resolution.
mitigation_strategy: Develop a comprehensive E2E test suite using Cypress to specifically target offline/online transitions and data integrity.

task_name: Terraform: Define AWS Cognito User Pool and App Client
resource_notes: Critical infrastructure for authentication. Misconfiguration will block all user-facing features.
alternative_approach: Use a different identity provider, which would require significant architectural changes.
risk_factors: Single point of failure for infrastructure; misconfiguration of OAuth flow can be difficult to debug.
mitigation_strategy: Provide Cognito ARN and JWKS URI to backend team as soon as it's provisioned.
